Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer - Full Warranty Sterling by Music Man STV60-VBL St. Vincent Signature in Vincent Blue - Demo Used Sterling 6 String Electric Guitar in Vincent Blue With Sterling Gig Bag - Used - Description The Sterling by Music Man St. Vincent offers many of the features of the Ernie Ball Music Man model at a more affordable price point. Unique in design, yet familiar in a perfect combination of style, balance, versatility and playability. Unique From The Top Down A completely new, refreshing design, featuring a perfectly balanced, bevel-top African Mahogany body, Rock Maple neck and Rosewood fretboard with St. Vincent signature fretboard inlays. Speak In Volumes An amazing array of tonal variations are available from the three specially voiced, Music Man specification mini-humbuckers which are selected by a custom configured 5 way switch Unrivaled Tuning Stability The two-point, bent steel saddle ""Vintage Tremolo"", oversized Music Man 4 + 2 headstock providing straight string pull, and factory equipped Ernie Ball Slinky strings keep you in tone and in tune. Features/Specs Model : STV60 Body Wood : Mahogany Body Color : Vincent Blue Bridge : Vintage Tremolo Pickguard : Matte Black (SBK), White (VBL) Scale Length : 25-1/2" (64.8cm) Neck Radius : 9-1/2" (24cm) Frets : 22 Frets, Narrow Neck Width : 1.65"(42mm) at Nut Neck Wood : Hard Maple Fingerboard : Rosewood Fret Markers : Custom St. Vincent Inlays Tuning Machines : Diecast Truss Rod : Single Action Neck Attachment : 5 Bolts Controls : 1 Volume, 1 Tone Switching : 5-way Toggle Pickup Selector Pickups : HHH Strings : Ernie Ball 2221 Regular Slinky Gig Bag : Deluxe Sterling by Music Man Bag We are authorized dealers for all these brands.
